thread.title: App of the Week: Lark
thread.title_full: App of the Week: Lark - SFGate

author: sfgate.com
title: App of the Week: Lark
text:
In a nutshell : A round-the-clock personal weight-loss coach and nutritionist
Cool factor : The Lark app motivates you to stay healthy and hit weight-loss goals by gently nagging you to stay active and eat correctly. The app tracks activity data recorded by your mobile phone and asks you to log each meal. Then it congratulates you — “Nice choice eating healthy grains” — or chides you for “moving and grooving” a little less than usual.
Note : Free for iPhone and Apple Watch. Also for Android, and preinstalled on newer Samsung phones.
— Benny Evangelista , bevangelista@sfchronicle.com
